Example.Title: Java
Example.Content:
// Initialize library
String clientId = "www.mywebshop.com";
BringService bringService = new BringService(clientId);

// Prepare query
Package packet = new Package();
Shipment shipment = new Shipment();
shipment.withFromPostalCode("1407");
shipment.withToPostalCode("7600");
shipment.addPackage(packet);
shipment.addProduct(ProductType.SERVICEPAKKE);

// Fetch price information from Bring
ShippingGuideResult shippingGuideResult = bringService.queryShippingGuide(shipment, QueryType.EXPECTED_DELIVERY);
String expectedDeliveryDays = shippingGuideResult.getProduct(ProductType.SERVICEPAKKE).getExpectedDelivery().getWorkingDays();

// Print out
System.out.println("Expected delivery days: " + expectedDeliveryDays);

Example output

    Expected delivery days: 2

Parameter.Title: Country Code
Parameter.Description:
Is specified by adding ?fromCountry=NO&toCountry=DK.

Country Codes are ISO-3166-1-alpha-2

Example.Title: Java
Example.Content:
// Initialize library
String clientId = "www.mywebshop.com";
BringService bringService = new BringService(clientId);

// Prepare query
Package packet = new Package();
packet.withWeightInGrams("4233");
Shipment shipment = new Shipment();
shipment.withFromPostalCode("2100");
shipment.withFromCountry("NO");
shipment.withToPostalCode("2100");
shipment.withToCountry("DK");
shipment.addPackage(packet);
shipment.addProduct(ProductType.CARRYON_HOMESHOPPING_NORWAY);

// Fetch price information from Bring
ShippingGuideResult shippingGuideResult = bringService.queryShippingGuide(shipment, QueryType.EXPECTED_DELIVERY);
String expectedDeliveryDays = shippingGuideResult.getProduct(ProductType.CARRYON_HOMESHOPPING_NORWAY).getExpectedDelivery().getWorkingDays();

// Print out
System.out.println("Expected delivery days: " + expectedDeliveryDays);

Example output

    Expected delivery days: 3-5

Example.Title: Java
Example.Content:
// Initialize library
String clientId = "www.mywebshop.com";
BringService bringService = new BringService(clientId);

// Prepare query
Package packet = new Package();
packet.withWeightInGrams("1500");
Shipment shipment = new Shipment();
shipment.withFromPostalCode("7600");
shipment.withToPostalCode("1407");
shipment.addPackage(packet);

// Fetch price information from Bring
ShippingGuideResult shippingGuideResult = bringService.queryShippingGuide(shipment, QueryType.PRICE);
String price = shippingGuideResult.getProduct(ProductType.SERVICEPAKKE).getPrice().getPackagePriceWithoutAdditionalServices().getAmountWithoutVAT();

// Print out
System.out.println("Price: " + price + " NOK");

Example output

    Price: 94.00 NOK

Example.Title: Java
Example.Content:
// Initialize library
String clientId = "www.mywebshop.com";
BringService bringService = new BringService(clientId);

// Prepare query
Package packet = new Package();
packet.withLength("30").withWidth("40").withHeight("40");
Shipment shipment = new Shipment();
shipment.withFromPostalCode("7600");
shipment.withToPostalCode("1407");
shipment.addPackage(packet);

// Fetch price information from Bring
ShippingGuideResult shippingGuideResult = bringService.queryShippingGuide(shipment, QueryType.PRICE);
String price = shippingGuideResult.getProduct(ProductType.SERVICEPAKKE).getPrice().getPackagePriceWithoutAdditionalServices().getAmountWithoutVAT();

// Print out
System.out.println("Price: " + price + " NOK");

Example output

    Price: 120.00 NOK

Parameter.Title: Volume
Parameter.Description:
Instead of, or in addition to, using the package's weight and dimensions you can specify volume. This is relevant for non-rectangular hexahedron shaped packages, and depending on the volume, it could affect the set of available products.

The unit is dm3.

Example.Title: Java
Example.Content:
// Initialize library
String clientId = "www.mywebshop.com";
BringService bringService = new BringService(clientId);

// Prepare query
Package packet = new Package();
packet.withVolume("33");
Shipment shipment = new Shipment();
shipment.withFromPostalCode("7600");
shipment.withToPostalCode("1407");
shipment.addPackage(packet);

// Fetch price information from Bring
ShippingGuideResult shippingGuideResult = bringService.queryShippingGuide(shipment, QueryType.PRICE);
String price = shippingGuideResult.getProduct(ProductType.SERVICEPAKKE).getPrice().getPackagePriceWithoutAdditionalServices().getAmountWithoutVAT();

// Print out
System.out.println("Price: " + price + " NOK");

Example output

    Price: 106.00 NOK

Parameter.Title: Shipping date
Parameter.Description:
This parameter specifies which date the shipment is picked-up or delivered to Bring to be delivered to the recipient.

Accepted format is: YYYY-MM-DD.

If this parameter is specified the response will include expected delivery date in addition to amount of working days.

Example.Title: Java
Example.Content:
// Initialize library
String clientId = "www.mywebshop.com";
BringService bringService = new BringService(clientId);

// Prepare query
Package packet = new Package();
packet.withVolume("33");
Shipment shipment = new Shipment();
shipment.withFromPostalCode("7600");
shipment.withToPostalCode("1407");
shipment.withShippingDateTime(new DateTime("2011-07-30"));
shipment.addProduct(ProductType.EKSPRESS09);
shipment.addPackage(packet);

// Fetch price information from Bring
ShippingGuideResult shippingGuideResult = bringService.queryShippingGuide(shipment, QueryType.ALL);
String price = shippingGuideResult.getProduct(ProductType.EKSPRESS09).getPrice().getPackagePriceWithoutAdditionalServices().getAmountWithoutVAT();

// Print out
System.out.println("Price: " + price + " NOK");

Example output

    Price: 408.00 NOK

Parameter.Title: Shipping time
Parameter.Description:
Use this parameter if you would like to specify when during the day the package needs to be picked up from the departure point.

This parameter is only considered for courier and express products. It is also optional.

Accepted format is hh:mm. (AM and PM not allowed, please use 24-hour clock.)

Example.Title: Java
Example.Content:
// Initialize library
String clientId = "www.mywebshop.com";
BringService bringService = new BringService(clientId);

// Prepare query
Package packet = new Package();
packet.withVolume("33");
Shipment shipment = new Shipment();
shipment.withFromPostalCode("7600");
shipment.withToPostalCode("1407");
shipment.withShippingDateTime(new DateTime(2011, 8, 30, 13, 37, 0, 0));
shipment.addPackage(packet);

// Fetch price information from Bring
ShippingGuideResult shippingGuideResult = bringService.queryShippingGuide(shipment, QueryType.ALL);
String price = shippingGuideResult.getProduct(ProductType.SERVICEPAKKE).getPrice().getPackagePriceWithoutAdditionalServices().getAmountWithoutVAT();

// Print out
System.out.println("Price: " + price + " NOK");

Example output

    Price: 106.00 NOK

Parameter.Title: EDI setting
Parameter.Description:
Specify the whether or the shipment has been pre-registered (EDI).

Can be specified with the edi=false parameter.

This will affect response prices and might affect which products are available.

Example.Title: Java
Example.Content:
// Initialize library
String clientId = "www.mywebshop.com";
BringService bringService = new BringService(clientId);

// Prepare query
Package packet = new Package();
packet.withWeightInGrams("1500");
Shipment shipment = new Shipment();
shipment.withFromPostalCode("7600");
shipment.withToPostalCode("1407");
shipment.withEdi(false);
shipment.addPackage(packet);

// Fetch price information from Bring
ShippingGuideResult shippingGuideResult = bringService.queryShippingGuide(shipment, QueryType.ALL);
String price = shippingGuideResult.getProduct(ProductType.SERVICEPAKKE).getPrice().getPackagePriceWithoutAdditionalServices().getAmountWithoutVAT();

// Print out
System.out.println("Price: " + price + " NOK");

Example output

    Price: 81.00 NOK

Parameter.Title: Shipped from post office
Parameter.Description: The response data may vary depending on whether or not Bring must collect the shipment or if the customer delivers the shipment from a post office.

Example.Title: Java
Example.Content:
// Initialize library
String clientId = "www.mywebshop.com";
BringService bringService = new BringService(clientId);

// Prepare query
Package packet = new Package();
packet.withWeightInGrams("1500");
Shipment shipment = new Shipment();
shipment.withFromPostalCode("7600");
shipment.withToPostalCode("1407");
shipment.withPostingAtPostOffice(true);
shipment.addProduct(ProductType.SERVICEPAKKE);
shipment.addPackage(packet);

// Fetch price information from Bring
ShippingGuideResult shippingGuideResult = bringService.queryShippingGuide(shipment, QueryType.PRICE);
String price = shippingGuideResult.getProduct(ProductType.SERVICEPAKKE).getPrice().getPackagePriceWithoutAdditionalServices().getAmountWithoutVAT();

// Print out
System.out.println("Price: " + price + " NOK");

Example output

    Price: 92.00 NOK

Parameter.Title: Additional services
Parameter.Description:
Adds information about additional services when they are available.

There are currently 3 additional services that can be specified this way. To add multiple services simply chain the parameters.

  • &additional=postoppkrav
  • &additional=evarsling
  • &additional=lordagsutkjoring

Example.Title: Java
Example.Content:
// Initialize library
String clientId = "www.mywebshop.com";
BringService bringService = new BringService(clientId);

// Prepare query
Package packet = new Package();
packet.withWeightInGrams("1500");
Shipment shipment = new Shipment();
shipment.withFromPostalCode("7600");
shipment.withToPostalCode("1407");
shipment.withShippingDateTime(new DateTime("2009-03-27"));

Set additionalServices = new HashSet();
additionalServices.add(AdditionalService.EVARSLING);
additionalServices.add(AdditionalService.LORDAGSUTKJORING);
additionalServices.add(AdditionalService.POSTOPPKRAV);

shipment.withAdditionalServices(additionalServices);
shipment.addProduct(ProductType.SERVICEPAKKE);
shipment.addPackage(packet);

// Fetch price information from Bring
ShippingGuideResult shippingGuideResult = bringService.queryShippingGuide(shipment, QueryType.PRICE);
String price = shippingGuideResult.getProduct(ProductType.SERVICEPAKKE).getPrice().getPackagePriceWithoutAdditionalServices().getAmountWithoutVAT();

// Print out
System.out.println("Price: " + price + " NOK");

Example output

    Price: 78.00 NOK

Parameter.Title: Public ID
Parameter.Description:
Is specified by using the pid parameter to your request.

Bring requires this parameter in order to know who to contact if they would require support or follow-up to a certain API request.

Example.Content: If your Shipping Guide IE is: 372b269a-4f07-4c4e-92b9-460cb92b0767 your pid is 460cb92b0767
